constraint.name: isoceles
constraint.expressions: AND( AND(AND(i DIF j, i DIF k), j DIF k), ( ((triangleIsoceles[0]\point[j]\x - triangleIsoceles[0]\point[i]\x) ^ 2 + (triangleIsoceles[0]\point[j]\y - triangleIsoceles[0]\point[i]\y) ^ 2) EQ ((triangleIsoceles[0]\point[k]\x - triangleIsoceles[0]\point[i]\x) ^ 2 + (triangleIsoceles[0]\point[k]\y - triangleIsoceles[0]\point[i]\y) ^ 2) ) )
